properties.name: Vol. 1. Plate, F. [Map bounded by Madison St., Ralph Ave., Decatur St., Stuyvesant Ave.; Including Putman St., Jefferson St., Hancock St., Halsey St., Macon St., Mc Donough St., Reid Ave., Patchen Ave.]
